metadata.title: CVE-2022-3370 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Custom Elements in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.91allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
